Items.Title: Oversight - The New York City Board of Elections
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - The New York City Board of Elections

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to the department of correction promoting absentee voting among jailed individuals
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Dept of Correction promoting absentee voting among jailed individuals.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to requiring assistance if requested for individuals signing up to be organ donors as part of the agency-based voter registration program
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring assistance if requested for individuals signing up to be organ donors as part of the agency-based voter registration program.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign into law, A.9108 and S.6452-A, which would amend the election law to consolidate New York’s federal, state, and local primaries into one primary which would take place on the fourth Tuesday of June.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Consolidate NY’s federal, state, and local primaries into one primary which would take place on the fourth Tuesday of June. (A.9108 and S.6452-A)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, A2529/S857, allowing 16 and 17 year-olds to pre-register to vote.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Allowing 16 and 17 year-olds to pre-register to vote. (A2529/S857)

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign A.7634, which would amend both the New York State Election Law and the Correction Law, in relation to voting by convicted felons.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Voting by convicted felons. (A.7634)

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to online facilitation of voter registration.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Online facilitation of voter registration.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Mayor of the City of New York to create an annual Student Voter Registration Day.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Create an annual Student Voter Registration Day.
